participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: outgoing and competitive, loves sports, and enjoys social gatherings.
participant_1.background: i have a children and a dogs. i own a house in florida. i enjoy american sports. i am a male.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: active and health-conscious, enjoys fitness and is always looking for new ways to stay in shape.
participant_2.background: eating is something i do when i'm bored. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i have short hair. two dogs live with me. i go to the gym regularly.

content.text: I go to the gym regularly
i don't workout much, i'm more into american sports. what about you?
